column3: Latest;UPDATE: A British man named Richard Anthony Owen
column5: has been named as the foreigner who died in The Pub. The man had walked into the bar and began feeling dizzy and out of breath. The owner called an ambulance
column6: but he died before it arrived.------The official cause of death was given as kâ€™jal
column8: but can also mean sudden death (heart attack/stroke etc).------Phnom Penh:------ Breaking News: At 4:40 pm on July 2
column10: a man suddenly died at The Pub
column13: Khan Daun Penh.------Police have now arrived and are making an investigation.------The victim has been named locally as  from the UK.------Details to follow.
